title: Healthcare Venture-Capital Fundraising Surges
sub_head: Established investors cruise through fundraising; first-time funds face tougher road
body:
Healthcare venture capitalists are capitalizing on their recent investment successes by refueling with new funds.
U.S. venture firms focusing mainly on healthcare have raised $44.8 billion across 183 funds this year through Oct. 11, compared with $43.5 billion in 264 funds in all of last year, according to market tracker PitchBook Data Inc.
